newcollectiblenft: New collectible NFT every month. To get it, buy at least 0.1 tonne of any of our carbon abatements. If you buy 1 tonne at once, you get a premium version of the NFT. Buy 10 at once and you get a super premium version. Stay tuned for promotions to get older NFTs you may have missed.
